list_definition.definition: to twist or turn (especially hair) into small coils or rolls
(sometimes with up) to move in curves; to bend or roll

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The paper curled (up) at the edges.
She wears her hair in long curls.
My hair has very little curl in it.

list_ex_of_english: From these grow several naked green stems, each with a few withering, curling leaves.
